# The `DWARFVerifier` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

A class that verifies DWARF debug information given a DWARF Context.

Definition at line 48 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-h">DWARFVerifier.h</a>.

### verifyAppleAccelTable() {#a20e5e8138c16f2dec974468796dc9ce4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned DWARFVerifier::verifyAppleAccelTable (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarfsection">DWARFSection</a> &#42; AccelSection, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dataextractor">DataExtractor</a> &#42; StrData, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; SectionName)</>}>
Verify that an Apple-style accelerator table is valid.

This function currently checks that:
<ul>
<li>The fixed part of the header fits in the section</li>
<li>The size of the section is as large as what the header describes</li>
<li>There is at least one atom</li>
<li>The form for each atom is valid</li>
<li>The tag for each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> in the table is valid</li>
<li>The buckets have a valid index, or they are empty</li>
<li>Each hashdata offset is valid</li>
<li>Each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> is valid</li>
</ul>



<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="AccelSection">pointer to the section containing the acceleration table</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="StrData">pointer to the string section</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="<a href=&quot;/docs/api/structs/llvm/sectionname&quot;>SectionName</a>">the name of the table we&#39;re verifying</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
The number of errors occurred during verification
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-h/#l00267">267</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-h">DWARFVerifier.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-cpp/#l01110">1110</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-cpp">DWARFVerifier.cpp</a>.

### verifyDebugInfoReferences() {#ada93ebcea6044a41816d50549fcc55b9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned DWARFVerifier::verifyDebugInfoReferences (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> ReferenceMap &amp; References, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">llvm::function&#95;ref</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfunit">DWARFUnit</a> &#42;(uint64&#95;t)&gt; GetUnitForDieOffset)</>}>
Verifies the all valid references that were found when iterating through all of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> attributes.

This function will verify that all references point to DIEs whose <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> offset matches. This helps to ensure if a DWARF link phase moved things around, that it doesn&#39;t create invalid references by failing to relocate <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/cu">CU</a> relative and absolute references.

### verifyDebugNames() {#a1971b0cb1f922d864c57412c6e02091a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned DWARFVerifier::verifyDebugNames (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarfsection">DWARFSection</a> &amp; AccelSection, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dataextractor">DataExtractor</a> &amp; StrData)</>}>
Verify that the DWARF v5 accelerator table is valid.

This function currently checks that:
<ul>
<li>Headers individual Name Indices fit into the section and can be parsed.</li>
<li>Abbreviation tables can be parsed and contain valid index attributes with correct form encodings.</li>
<li>The <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/cu">CU</a> lists reference existing compile units.</li>
<li>The buckets have a valid index, or they are empty.</li>
<li>All names are reachable via the hash table (they have the correct hash, and the hash is in the correct bucket).</li>
<li>Information in the index entries is complete (all required entries are present) and consistent with the debug&#95;info section DIEs.</li>
</ul>



<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="AccelSection">section containing the acceleration table</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="StrData">string section</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
The number of errors occurred during verification
</SectionUser>

### verifyUnitContents() {#a43d71541628cf9201a712c7c87885096}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned DWARFVerifier::verifyUnitContents (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfunit">DWARFUnit</a> &amp; Unit, ReferenceMap &amp; UnitLocalReferences, ReferenceMap &amp; CrossUnitReferences)</>}>
Verifies the header of a unit in a .debug&#95;info or .debug&#95;types section.

This function currently verifies:
<ul>
<li>The debug info attributes.</li>
<li>The debug info form=s.</li>
<li>The presence of a root <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>.</li>
<li>That the root <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> is a unit <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>.</li>
<li>If a unit type is provided, that the unit <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> matches the unit type.</li>
<li>The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> ranges.</li>
<li>That call site entries are only nested within subprograms with a DW&#95;AT&#95;call attribute.</li>
</ul>



<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Unit">The DWARF Unit to verify.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
The number of errors that occurred during verification.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-h/#l00165">165</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-h">DWARFVerifier.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-cpp/#l00253">253</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-cpp">DWARFVerifier.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### verifyUnitHeader() {#a6023afbb44ab1aec67d9adfda557c089}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool DWARFVerifier::verifyUnitHeader (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdataextractor">DWARFDataExtractor</a> DebugInfoData, uint64&#95;t &#42; Offset, unsigned UnitIndex, uint8&#95;t &amp; UnitType, bool &amp; isUnitDWARF64)</>}>
Verifies the header of a unit in a .debug&#95;info or .debug&#95;types section.

This function currently checks for:
<ul>
<li>Unit is in 32-bit DWARF format. The function can be modified to support 64-bit format.</li>
<li>The DWARF version is valid</li>
<li>The unit type is valid (if unit is in version &gt;=5)</li>
<li>The unit doesn&#39;t extend beyond the containing section</li>
<li>The address size is valid</li>
<li>The offset in the .debug&#95;abbrev section is valid</li>
</ul>



<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="DebugInfoData">The section data</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Offset">A reference to the offset start of the unit. The offset will be updated to point to the next unit in the section</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="UnitIndex">The index of the unit to be verified</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="UnitType">A reference to the type of the unit</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="isUnitDWARF64">A reference to a flag that shows whether the unit is in 64-bit format.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
true if the header is verified successfully, false otherwise.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-h/#l00145">145</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-h">DWARFVerifier.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-cpp/#l00134">134</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-cpp">DWARFVerifier.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
